name: The Naked Game
description: The Naked Game is a first-person psychological thriller/puzzle/exploration game inspired on real events connected by a strong immersive story of a young Eurasian girl who goes on a trip from Japan, her home country, to France.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 650M DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space
